title: Dragon
creator_credit: Lucy MacLaren, Paul Goldman and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: Two young girls leave a dragon on a tram and go to the depot at night to find it. Sound: Ann Turner. Continuity: Georgina Wallace-Crabbe. Photography: David Collyer and Paul Goldman.
